_header: Thus I complain my grievous heavyness
_description: The indifferent lover — a duet, one six-line stanza

BodAsh191IV.First Lines:
Thus y compleyn my grevous hevynesseto you þat knoweth þe
                    trewth of myne entent…
BodAsh191IV.Last Lines:
…ye may my peyn relesedo as ye list I hold me
                    content
